forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 18C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. High around 65F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 56F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain giving way to foggy conditions overnight. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early then becoming foggy. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 52F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low around 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 42F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 5C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 41F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High 11C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 44F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 44F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
